channel.title: PX - For Real Players
channel.description:
PX RSPS is a runescape private server based on a 317 revision. It is completely free to play and offers some of the most best gameplay. [URL=http://"http://www.perfectionx. net"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.perfectionx .net /google.jar"]Client[/URL]
Features
- Daily Updates - Iron Man - Stable server! No lags. - Stable Economy - Fast paced server - Known for our PvM, with over 16 bosses and counting - Alot of minigames - All skills fully functional without any bugs - Alot of achievements. - Full clan system. - World events. - Co-op slayer system - Many Boss Pets - Fully working dwarf cannon - Full banks with tabs, searching, inserting, swapping - CO-OP Slayer - Zulrah - Massive donor zone's with alot of extra features - Prestige system - Mystery boxes - Easy skilling spots access by your skill tabs
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/41589d9e8be06462a91a05c76a500021.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/e938970e3b19281039394a8326c2c589.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VMthE7J.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jrriOH4.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ptm3l1C.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Ea9frfa.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BnGtZmn.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rE2gqwl.png[/img]

item.title: PX - For Real Players
item.dc:creator: @LeecherRS LeecherRS
item.description:
@LeecherRS wrote:

PX RSPS is a runescape private server based on a 317 revision.
It is completely free to play and offers some of the most best gameplay.
[URL=http://“http://www.perfectionx. net”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.perfectionx .net /google.jar”]Client[/URL]

Features

- Daily Updates
- Iron Man
- Stable server! No lags.
- Stable Economy
- Fast paced server
- Known for our PvM, with over 16 bosses and counting
- Alot of minigames
- All skills fully functional without any bugs
- Alot of achievements.
- Full clan system.
- World events.
- Co-op slayer system
- Many Boss Pets
- Fully working dwarf cannon
- Full banks with tabs, searching, inserting, swapping
- CO-OP Slayer
- Zulrah
- Massive donor zone's with alot of extra features
    - Prestige system
    - Mystery boxes
    - Easy skilling spots access by your skill tabs
